pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hierarchical Partitioning of Marginal R2 for Generalized Mixed- Effect Models // This function conducts commonality analysis and hierarchical partitioning to calculate the unique, shared (referred as to "common") and individual contributions of each predictor towards marginal R2 for generalized mixed-effect model, applying the algorithm of Lai J.,Zou Y., Zhang J.,Peres- Neto P.(2022) Generalizing hierarchical and variation partitioning in multiple regression and canonical analyses using the rdacca.hp R package.Methods in Ecology and Evolution,DOI:10.1111/2041-210X.13800.
